EmailTemplate.subject: TrueCost REP Support: Contract Length Changed for Existing Plan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Plan__c.REP_Profile__c},
You have an active plan that is nearing/past its "Plan End Date," and needs to be updated at your next convenience. See below for details:
Plan Name: {!Plan__c.Name} Plan End Date: {!Plan__c.Plan_End_Date__c}

Thank you,
TrueCost REP Support
